text: Poselyayte yikh tam, de zhyvete sami, naskilʹky vam dozvolyayutʹ vashi statky. Ne zapodiyuyte yim shkody, shchob ne robyty shche vazhche. Yakshcho zh vahitni vony, to utrymuyte yikh do toho chasu, poky ne narodyatʹ vony. Yakshcho zh hoduyutʹ vony hruddyu [ditey] vashykh, to davayte yim vynahorodu yikhnyu ta y radʹtesya mizh soboyu po-dobromu. Yakshcho zh tse bude vazhko dlya vas, to zaproshuyte hoduvalʹnytsyu
